text: Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzamo'a anage hie, maka'zama refkoma hanua knamo'a, avenifima tevema hugre'nageno keonke zama tefizo nehiankna kna neankino, avufga rama nehia vahe'ene, kefo avu'ava'ma nehia vahe'enena, hagage trazama tevemo'ma tefanenema hiaza hugahie. Ana tevemo'a arafunama, azankuna'ma, maka'zama 'anena tefanane hugahie.
